Leveraging 24 years of C-Level Corporate Concierge experience to create the best in class service provider.  Coupling the industry's best proprietary technology with the most extensive errand running capability to build the foundation of TimeSquared.
With 20+ years of experience leading 100+ skilled professional services professionals, I am a strong hands-on operator who specialized in operational excellence.

•	United 100+ highly skilled employees who work all across North America, and 200+ subcontractors into one collaborative, effective team •	Effectively managed the budgets of the 2 most profitable divisions of LesConcierges•	Streamlined operations across the division including: recruiting, hiring, on-boarding, training, employee handbook, employee recognition, performance evaluation, communication, etc.  •	Successfully launched several new employee recognition programs across the integrated division.  •	Secured 30+ client relationships with large corporate clients (Apple, L’Oreal, USAA, Genentech, Fidelity, Texas Instruments, etc.) •	Increased sales commissions to an unprecedented 20%+ above quarterly goal. •	Managed the global expansion of the concierge services for Apple Computers into Ireland, the UK•	Successfully transitioned all 2 Places corporate clients and employees to LesConcierges

•	Grew the company to over 132 employees across the US and Canada •	Built a multi- million dollar national corporate concierge service from an initial investment of  $5,000•	Yielded a 20%+ net profit margin•	Developed a customized assessment tool to aid in the critically important evaluation of candidates for employment•	Expanded the company throughout North America to provide professional services to large corporations across a wide variety of industries including consulting, technology, healthcare, pharmaceutical, accounting, bio-tech, retail, banking and more•	Elevated the company to one of the 500 fastest growing privately held companies in the US (Inc. 500 list) for two consecutive years •	Established effective “reseller” relationships with large global companies allowing them to sell our services while we seamlessly performed as their exclusive service provider•	Garnered tremendous media coverage which proved to be extremely effective in marketing the company

She brings the same combination of skills that she used to build 2Placesat1Time to the Hob Nob advisory team, and we realize how lucky we are to have her help. Andrea has helped shape Hob Nob's strategy through her enthusiastic involvement and insightful feedback, and I'd highly recommend that anyone with the opportunity to learn from her take her up on it!

summary: After selling the national corporate concierge firm I founded 20+ years ago, I am thrilled to be back at it.  Leveraging the lessons learned and tons of experience, I have created a new company ready to meet the challenges of today's technology-driven business environment. I hope you will allow TimeSquared to grow time exponentially for you!  Check out www.timesquaredconcierge.com
